text: @chicagosmayor There be no economy if we Dead. COVID-19 is killing people quickly. Either you haven't had a death or just don't care. If the govt did nothing they would still be criticized. Lightfoot & Pritzner in a catch 22. But Good leaders can handle the backlash when doing the right thing.
